info.description:
*******************
rainbowlotus.policy
*******************

This package provides the *policy* for Rainbow Lotus websites.  As such, it
orchestrates the dependencies, codifies the charactersitics, and systematizes
the settings such that it turns ordinary Plone_ sites into Rainbow Lotus sites.

.. _Plone: http://plone.org/



Installation
============

Use Buildout with the plone.recipe.zope2instance recipe.

• Add ``rainbowlotus.policy`` to the list of eggs to install, e.g.::

    [buildout]
    ...
    eggs =
        ...
        rainbowlotus.policy

  Alternatively, include ``rainbowlotus.policy`` as a dependency of another
  package.

• Re-run buildout, e.g. with::
  
    $ ./bin/buildout
        
You don't need to list a ZCML slug because ``rainbowlotus.policy`` lists a
``z3c.autoinclude.plugin`` target for Plone.



Changelog
=========

This document tracks changes from release to release.


1.0.0 — FCS
-----------

First customer ship.


0.0.0 — Unreleased
------------------

This release hasn't been released. Weird, huh?
